products.name: Foundation Kit
products.description: A complete foundation kit with multiple shades to match various skin tones. Ideal for creating a flawless base.

products.name: Concealer Set
products.description: A set of creamy concealers for hiding dark circles, blemishes, and imperfections.

products.name: Contour Palette
products.description: A palette with sculpting shades to define and highlight the face, providing a natural, chiseled look.

products.name: Blush Kit
products.description: A set of blushes in various shades to add a healthy flush to the cheeks, giving a natural and radiant glow.

products.name: Setting Powder Set
products.description: A translucent setting powder that helps lock makeup in place for long-lasting wear.

products.name: Eyeshadow Palette
products.description: A colorful palette of matte and shimmer eyeshadows for creating versatile eye looks.

products.name: Eyeliner Set
products.description: A set of eyeliners in various finishes (gel, pencil, liquid) to define and accentuate the eyes.

products.name: Mascara Kit
products.description: A mascara set for adding volume, length, and curl to lashes, giving them a fuller and longer look.

products.name: Brow Definer Kit
products.description: A brow kit with pencils and powders for shaping and filling in the brows for a natural yet defined look.

products.name: False Lashes Set
products.description: A set of false lashes with varying lengths and volumes to enhance the natural lashes for dramatic looks.

products.name: Lipstick Set
products.description: A collection of lipsticks in vibrant shades, from nudes to bold reds, offering long-lasting wear.

products.name: Lip Gloss Collection
products.description: A set of lip glosses for adding shine and a hint of color to the lips.

products.name: Lip Liner Set
products.description: A set of lip liners to define and shape the lips, preventing lipstick from feathering.

products.name: Lip Balm Kit
products.description: A nourishing lip balm set to keep lips soft, hydrated, and smooth.

products.name: Lip Tint Set
products.description: A collection of lip tints that provide a natural, long-lasting color to the lips.

products.name: Nail Polish Set
products.description: A set of high-quality nail polishes in various shades for every occasion.

products.name: Gel Manicure Kit
products.description: A complete gel manicure kit with long-lasting color and shine.

products.name: Nail Art Kit
products.description: A set of tools and accessories for creating unique and artistic nail designs.

products.name: Nail Care Set
products.description: A kit with essential nail care products like cuticle oil, nail cream, and file to maintain healthy nails.

products.name: Nail Strengthening Kit
products.description: A set of treatments designed to strengthen weak and brittle nails, helping them grow longer and healthier.

products.name: Foundation Brush Set
products.description: A set of brushes specifically designed for smooth and even foundation application.

products.name: Eyeshadow Brush Kit
products.description: A kit of brushes for applying and blending eyeshadow seamlessly, ensuring a flawless eye makeup look.

products.name: Blush Brush Set
products.description: A set of brushes for applying blush, bronzer, and highlighter for a radiant finish.

products.name: Beauty Sponge Set
products.description: A set of makeup sponges for blending foundation and concealer to create a flawless base.

products.name: Makeup Remover Wipes Kit
products.description: A set of gentle, cleansing wipes to remove makeup, dirt, and oil from the skin.
